name: Transit by Time

inputs.name: Start
inputs.description: Start the transition at the From value

inputs.name: From
inputs.description: The start value of the transition

inputs.name: To
inputs.description: The end value of the transition

inputs.name: Duration
inputs.description: The total time of the transition

inputs.name: Interpolator
inputs.description: The type of interpolators, supporting Linear, Ease-in, Ease-out, Ease-in-out, and Ease-out-in

inputs.name: Loop
inputs.description: The number of times of looping the transition

outputs.name: Begin
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the transition begins

outputs.name: Stay
outputs.description: Keep executing the next node when the transition stays working

outputs.name: End
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the whole transition is finished

description: Transition from one value to another according to a certain interpolator within a certain time range. Supported types: Number, Vec2, Vec3, Vec4, and Color.
